title: Lemongrass + Argan Stem Cell Conditioner - 8 oz - Liquid
description: Lemongrass + Argan Stem Cell Conditioner by Acure Organics 8 oz Liquid Lemongrass Argan Stem Cell Conditioner 8 oz Liquid Product This daily nourishing conditioner provides vital moisture to combat everyday tangles and buildup. Promotes shiny soft healthy clean hair. Organic Argan Oil Argan Stem Cells CoQ10 help support hair keratin and strengthen the follicle connection. Organic Avocado Oil provides vitamin B12 and Organic Fair Trade Certified Cocoa Butter provides moisture. Safe for color treated hair. Voted Best Conditioner Ever by my Mom.
